“+ INBIFO Institut fOr biologische Forechung GmbH Sir
Contract Research

TELEFAX MESSAGENO: § _ Of J;

 

O ERa Toler” pron ae
Tero nsass aap Fontang On Papen DOT Cape ‘GSERRA
NL FAXOC
DATUM/DATE: 27 Jun.94
VON/FROM: Or. G. Schepers,
ANTO: Dr. Gerry Nixon

 

ADRESSE/ADDRESS: Phill Mortis U.S.A.

 

Telefax-Nr.: 001-804-274-28 91

 

ANZAHL DER FOLGENDEN SEITEN’ 2
NUMBER OF FOLLOWING PAGES

Dear Gerry:

Please find enclosed some remarks with respect to Kessler's statement
concerning the influence of ammonia (pH) on nicotine delivery Into cigarette
smoke. Please forward this remarks to Cathy Ellis.

Bost regards,

Pa

 

bSzEs6szoz

‘nde Regt: Cologne Hm 287
ner Marae Or Wel Raines

summary: A letter from Dr. Gerry Nixon to Phill Mortis U.S. was sent on 27 Jun.94. The letter was in response to Kessler's statement concerning the influence of ammonia (pH) on nicotine delivery Into cigarette smoke. Please forward this remarks to Cathy Ellis.
